subtitles:
58892 61964 People once believed
that when someone dies...

62187 66305 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

66567 69798 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

70029 75057 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

75369 78281 Then, sometimes...
just sometimes...

78497 83287 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

138105 142417 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

142693 146732 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

150410 153880 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

154123 157035 - All right, guys, let's do it.
- Devil's fuckin' Night.

157251 160448 - What's the count so far?
- 143 fires.

160672 163345 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

163550 168226 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

171392 174589 Yeah, I remember.
But you guys just can't come in here
and take her away like this.

174813 179091 There are procedures to stick by.
You guys should have
cleared this with me first.

179359 181827 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

182029 184782 - We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

184990 187140 I didn't give the order
to move her.

187326 190045 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see why they
took away your gold shield.

190246 194034 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
194292 197841 All right, clear out of here.

198088 200079 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

202135 207255 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

207557 209627 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

209810 212802 Look, I will. You just, uh,
lie back. Come on, come on.

223283 225353 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

225536 229688 Yeah, look. Your sister...
she's gonna be okay.

229957 233870 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.

234128 236801 She's my friend.
Her and Eric.

240010 243923 - You lied to her about Eric.
- Look, I had to.

244181 247537 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.
247769 249680 She's gonna die, isn't she?

258823 264261 Now, come on.
Come on, it's okay.
266623 268614 She's gonna be fine.

287021 291173 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

291442 293910 I used to think
that was true about everything...
294112 298310 families, friends, feelings.

298575 302329 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

302580 306698 two people who are meant to be
together... nothing can keep them apart.

345210 348247 What are you,
like the night watchman?

369737 371853 You know, what
this place needs...
372032 374910 is a good natural catastrophe.

375118 379077 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

379331 382880 Mickey, come on, man. You... You got
to put the mustard underneath first.

383127 385322 Maybe a flood
like in the Bible.
385505 388417 Hey, hey, hey, let me do it.

388633 392512 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

392763 396039 Come on. Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me. Lots of onions.

396267 399498 - All right, here you go.
- Hey, all right.
399729 402243 Now we're talkin'.
402441 406719 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

406987 410662 - How do you steer that thing
on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

410908 414298 See, now, Sarah, she's a genuine
hot dogger. You hungry?

414537 416607 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.

416790 420305 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
420544 423616 They make you fart big time.

430096 432485 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

432682 435401 from all the crap
floating around in it.
436812 439645 I wish I could have seen that.
500716 503833 Fire it up! Yeah!

544348 548102 - Fire it up! We busted their machines!

571253 574484 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-Bird, cop car, cop car.

582265 584381 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

590525 592834 - Damn it!
- Oh, my God!
- What was that?

593027 594938 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
595113 598423 Mickey, call it in for me!

692471 695941 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

696184 700018 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
700272 702342 Place looks fine to me.
702524 705197 Let's redecorate.
708864 710900 "Abashed, the devil stood...
711075 714590 and felt how awful goodness is.

714829 719220 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
732599 735193 No, no, no, no, me first.

783114 785912 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

789412 793644 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

793917 796670 Look at that.
Look at that.

796879 801031 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favourite holiday.
801300 804610 To Devil's Night.

804846 808122 You just go over there
and tell your pals...
808350 810705 You sick fuck.

your motherfuckin' mind, man?

822950 826181 Pussies drink last, man.

838342 841015 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

843097 846806 Hey, fire it up!

- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
850230 852903 Fire it up! Fire it up!

902830 906106 Restaurant.

910881 913953 - Wow, you look great.

921142 923576 - Come here!

960811 964087 Just paint your face

965566 968797 Slipping me away from you
970155 974592 It doesn't matter how you hide

974868 977336 We find you
if we're wanting to

and close your eyes

983753 988269 Sleep a while
You must be tired
988550 990745 But every night I burn
990928 993840 Screaming the animal scream
997894 1000169 Every night I burn
1000355 1004348 Dreaming the crow-black dream
1009449 1013727 Dreaming the crow-black dream

- It's 18K. It's crap.

1028553 1030783 Leather purse. Leather.

1035144 1037294 A blood stain that's on here?

1039857 1042690 I'll give you 50 bucks.

1042902 1046451 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
1046698 1049815 Right there for ya.
1050035 1052868 Decisions, decisions, yes.
1054582 1057619 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1057836 1060953 child molestin',
saprophyte motherfucker.

1061173 1064051 - Close the gate when you go out!

1064259 1066489 real good, massa.

1076815 1081093 Lucky I don't stab
your fat ass.
1097505 1101896 Someone take these dreams away
1102177 1106534 That point me to another day
1106807 1111483 Peculiar personalities
1111771 1115730 The stretch of true realities
1119029 1122908 They keep calling me
1123158 1126833 They keep calling me
1128164 1131156 Keep on calling me
1132919 1136036 They keep calling me

up for, crackhead, huh?
1193486 1196125 Halloween ain't till ma√±ana.
1238286 1241562 Fuck you, murderer!

1241790 1244350 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1244543 1248456 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1248714 1251945 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1252177 1254611 - You're out of your motherfucking mind...
- Listen!

1254805 1259435 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them on Halloween.

1259727 1264437 Yeah, yeah, right, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1264732 1267087 Her name was Shelly.

1267277 1270155 You cut her.
You raped her.

1270364 1275916 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1285422 1290098 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1290386 1294823 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1299604 1302164 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1304026 1305937 We never miss.
1314955 1317594 Try harder. Try again!
1322797 1327393 Victims. Aren't we all?

1338606 1344203 Sometimes it rains
inside my head
1344529 1347965 When the words run dry

1348200 1352113 And the walls are breathing
Hands are...

1352371 1356489 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- Yeah, it's a mess.

1361882 1363873 No, they don't
have to take you

1364051 1366690 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1366887 1371278 No, they don't
have to take you away

1371559 1375996 - Get out of my way, you worms!
- No, they don't have to take you away

1376273 1379948 Give me some of that
over there!

1380194 1383470 Why don't you ladies
come by later? Check me out.

1383698 1388488 Hey, guess what.
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1393334 1397247 Gather your soldiers. You're on

1397505 1400861 - Is the man in?

1430500 1432411 You're thinking
about the past.
1437466 1439536 Dad gave me this.
1439718 1443711 Fifth birthday.

1443973 1448444 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1461993 1464871 Is she asleep?
1471212 1473362 I think we broke her.
1478386 1480456 I love her eyes.

1486437 1492307 No, they don't
have to take you away

1498325 1501237 Hey, kid, get the hell
outta the road!
1507711 1509986 I don't hate them
1510172 1512447 But I know them

1512633 1517343 I don't want them
hangin' 'round
1517638 1519594 I won't roll my bones
1519766 1522234 Don't fuck with me.
1524146 1526376 I told you to stay out of here.

1530319 1534153 She's busy. Go play with
your dolls or something, okay?
1534407 1536716 I don't have any dolls.

1538870 1543068 - Get some food, huh?
- Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1548923 1552472 "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."

1562647 1567357 Thirty, I go 40 dollars.
And 20 from 60...
1567652 1569961 Who the fuck is this now?

1570155 1574148 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1577121 1580796 Go sleep it off
somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1586381 1588690 Always got to dick off.

1588884 1592672 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1601148 1604697 "Suddenly I heard a tapping,
as if someone...

1604944 1607742 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1610617 1612847 What are you talking about?
1613036 1615789 You heard me rapping, right?

1615998 1619957 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1622547 1625857 - I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.
- Yeah?

1626092 1629243 - Gold.
- You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1638856 1641290 Shit on me.
Shit on me!

1648492 1650642 Mr Gideon.
You're not paying attention.

1658712 1663547 I repeat,
a gold engagement ring, yes?

1663843 1667518 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1671434 1673948 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1679068 1684188 - Who's this sack of shit?
- That's Tin Tin, one of
T-Bird's little helpers.

1684490 1687402 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1687619 1690292 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1690497 1694376 This could be a turf hit, but it
doesn't look like your usual gang crap.

1694627 1699257 Oh, come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1699549 1701824 I'm supposed to thank you
for that, right?

1702010 1705161 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1706515 1708790 What the hell
do you call that?

1710895 1716174 I call it blood, Detective. I suppose
you'll write it up as graffiti.

1716484 1719123 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1727163 1729996 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?
- Don't you know this game?

1730208 1734406 What game are you talking about?
Okay, the rings.
I'll tell you about the rings!

1734671 1739222 They're in that-that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1739510 1744459 Take... Take the fucking rings out! You
can choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1748270 1750738 - Look, it goes up to the attic.

1767708 1771747 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1795823 1798621 - You have one chance to live.

1798826 1802785 - Thank you.

1803039 1806793 Now you're going to tell me

1807043 1808954 The Pit. They all

1809129 1814761 All of T-Birds's little potato-heads

he lives there upstairs, all right?

1815094 1818848 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1819098 1821407 - Shit!
- A whole jolly club...

1821601 1824240 - Stop! Stop! Please!

1829360 1832591 Each one of these is a life...
1832822 1835211 a life you helped destroy.

1839579 1841695 I'm not gonna kill you.

1841874 1845833 Your job will be to tell the rest of

1854513 1858665 Tell them Eric Draven

1860895 1864649 You walk outta here,

1893014 1896324 It's on the house, kiddo,

1896559 1898709 One root beer.

1923006 1926760 I am the police and I say don't move,

1928345 1932463 And I say

1932725 1935444 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1978776 1983167 - Hey, check it out.

1998506 2000861 Leave it, leave it! Run!

2015817 2021414 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

2021740 2025494 - Little early for Devil's Night.

2027246 2029760 You are very restless.

2029958 2032836 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2033045 2037357 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, you may get it, I know.

2048854 2051926 There are energies
aligning against you.

2052149 2054504 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

2077803 2080033 Nobody cleared this
little event with me.

2080222 2082099 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2082266 2084621 Well, sure.
You must be awful disappointed.

2084810 2088849 I got trouble. One of
my crew got himself perished.

2089107 2091302 - Yeah, and who might that be?

2091484 2095841 Somebody stuck his blades in all
his major organs in alphabetical order.

2096115 2101667 Gentlemen, by all means, I think we

2104749 2107058 You're working for me

2107252 2111928 - Whatever you say, I can do.

2112216 2116812 I still ain't heard the story

2117096 2121886 Is that a natural catastrophe

2122185 2125257 Call it my need to know.
2157099 2159567 Let go, you creep!

2164858 2168009 You need to slow down,

2170364 2174039 - He couldn't have stopped.
- He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2176245 2181273 - What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
- Sometimes.

2183420 2188130 It's more like surfing than skating.

2189468 2192858 - It can't rain all the time.

2209991 2214382 Don't thank me. Are we

2214663 2218815 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2219085 2223203 Annie, look at that.

2223465 2227458 "We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 Caulderon Court Apartments..."

2227719 2229994 - What is this, a petition?

2230180 2233092 for a very nice girl who found herself

2236145 2241265 Miss Shelly Webster and her nice

2303762 2307311 and watch this whole fucking city

2317235 2321114 In the motherfuckin'dark
2325328 2329480 I don't want to believe

- It's a squab.

2346017 2348247 Bird. B-B-Birdie.

2348437 2350905 Here, birdie, birdie, birdie,

2351106 2353939 Come here, birdie, birdie, birdie,

2356696 2359768 Birdie? Hey, birdie?

2373298 2377610 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly

2380139 2382858 Don't sweat it.

2384018 2387567 It's time for you to take

2402497 2407810 You are seriously fucked up.

2408128 2410881 You need professional help.

2413801 2417919 Bingo!

2428234 2432705 - Jesus Christ!

2432989 2437540 Stop me if you heard this one.

2443167 2446842 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2447088 2449443 Don't you ever fuckin' die?

2449633 2451749 "Can you put me up
for the night?"

2457391 2462419 - Does that hurt?

2464858 2468134 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2492514 2494391 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2497519 2500113 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2518000 2521709 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2533643 2537921 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2538189 2542740 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2554374 2558003 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2590164 2593793 If I wanted ice, I would have
asked for ice! Now fill it up!

2595712 2598306 Fill it up yourself,
macho man.
2598506 2601100 I really need this.

2611646 2614683 - You burn yourself playing with matches?
- Fuck off.

2614900 2617937 - You have an appointment.

2618153 2622510 - Drink up.
- This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2622783 2625775 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2625995 2629670 - Hey, hey, hon!
- Hey, good night, Darla.
2634213 2637250 You stay put right there.
2646810 2648846 Get away, steamhead.

2681015 2684803 Well, as you can see,
I'm here on the corner of 27th Street
and East Washington Place...

2685061 2688337 the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2688565 2691921 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see
across the street from me...
2692152 2694268 was totally demolished by fire.

2694446 2698917 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies, but cost

2699202 2703912 In fact, if it weren't
for the constant surveillance
by the local police precincts...
2707044 2711276 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

- I saw your body, man.
2717806 2721355 You... You died. You got buried.
2721601 2723990 You still have your hat on.
2726398 2728753 I gotta sit down.
2738704 2742822 are you some kind of... of ghost?

2752636 2756993 I don't know what I am. I need you

2759227 2763106 Well, you took a six-story
swan dive out of a window.
2763356 2766314 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2766526 2770917 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2771198 2773473 I mean, come on.
Read the file.

2773659 2777413 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

2777664 2781179 And her body finally
just gave it up.

2781418 2784694 I saw it, man.
I-I couldn't do jack for her.

2795350 2797181 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2804527 2807599 - You okay?
- I saw her.

2809783 2814811 I saw her through your eyes.
You stayed with her the whole time.

2815122 2820674 Yeah, well, you got
to understand something, all right?

2821004 2824679 I was... I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2824925 2828634 Uh, give me something
I could work with.

2833684 2836073 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2836271 2839422 You think any of those people
in that building... even the ones
who signed the petition...

2839649 2842959 would talk after
what happened to you?
2843195 2846267 I kept asking questions and...

2846490 2849050 finally got busted for sticking my nose
where it wasn't wanted.
2853164 2855041 This your wife?

2855208 2859520 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not any more.
We're getting a divorce.

2864594 2868030 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2868265 2870495 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2870684 2873994 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2884699 2889136 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2894335 2897088 You gonna vanish
into thin air again?

2901051 2903440 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2906515 2912192 Look, man, um, I'm sorry
as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2924410 2926924 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2927122 2929636 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2929833 2933223 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2933462 2936534 - Other than that, my day sucked.
